Synopsis: A common man seeks revenge from an unscrupulous man for wrongly framing and murdering his father.

Synopsis: A rich industrialist severs ties with his adopted son after he marries a poor girl. Years later, his younger son plots to unite them.

Synopsis: A man with a fatal heart disease tries to play matchmaker to a troubled young woman and her best friend, despite being in love with her.

Synopsis: An extra-marital affair between a bitter football coach and an unhappy schoolteacher destroy their respective marriages.

Cast: Abhishek Bachchan, John Abraham, Priyanka Chopra, Bobby Deol
Synopsis: Two men in Miami pretend to be gay to share an apartment with a young woman, but they both eventually fall in love with her.

Cast: Hrithik Roshan, Rishi Kapoor, Sanjay Dutt, Priyanka Chopra
Synopsis: A common man seeks revenge from an unscrupulous man for wrongly framing and murdering his father.
